entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
